content.question: A drop of water hits the surface of a lake and forms concentric circular ripples. The radius, in inches, of the circle enclosed by the outer ripple increases as a function of time <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, in minutes, and is modeled by the function <math alttext="r"><semantics><mi>r</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> given by <math alttext="r open parentheses t close parentheses equals 25 square root of 2 t plus 1 end root"><semantics><mrow><mi>r</mi><mfenced><mi>t</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></msqrt></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. Which of the following gives the area of the circle enclosed by the outer ripple, in square inches, as a function of time <math alttext="t"><semantics><mi>t</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, in minutes? (Note: The area of a circle with radius <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="A equals pi x squared"><semantics><mrow><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.)

choices.label: ​<math alttext="25 square root of 2 pi t squared plus 1 end root"><semantics><mrow><mn>25</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></msqrt></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="25 pi t squared square root of 2 t plus 1 end root"><semantics><mrow><mn>25</mn><mi>π</mi><msup><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msqrt><mn>2</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></msqrt></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Construct new functions, using transformations, compositions, inverses, or regressions, that may be useful in modeling contexts, criteria, or data, with and without technology.
